lines.text:
[a thunking sound is heard, and a ladder appears at Clarissa's window]
Hi, Sam!
[Sam climbs the ladder, and the sound of a bluesy guitar strumming a chord is heard]

[after Ferguson hid Clarissa's bike as a joke, and it disappeared]
Well, Ferguson, if it's really gone and you can't get it back, you know what you gotta do.
No, Dad, not pay for it!
[Clarissa and her dad, who has come down with the flu, are discussing Bouncy Balls]
But don't you think it's a little weird to eat something that you've been bouncing on the floor?
Dad, you haven't really been eating them after they've been on the floor, have you?
I'm gonna go get some more bouillon.
Whoever said, "The more things change the more things stay the same," definitely had the right POV.

[about the brat she has to babysit]
This year I've got the perfect tools to tame little Elsie.
Well, if you're not packing thermo-nuclear warheads, I think you're traveling light.
Your mother and I aren't fighting. We're having a discussion.
